Elements.Name: Title
Description: Choose the title screen music. (Default: Sonic 3)

Elements.Name: OneUpAnniversary
Description: Choose the 1-UP jingle that plays in modes other than Classic Mode. (Default: Sonic 3)

Elements.Name: OneUpClassic
Description: Choose the 1-UP jingle that plays in Classic Mode. (Default: Sonic & Knuckles)

Elements.Name: Invincibility
Description: Choose the invincibility music. (Default: Sonic & Knuckles)

Elements.Name: Super
Description: Choose the music when in your Super or Hyper form or on the Original Blue Spheres Perfect screen. (Default: Origins Super)

Elements.Name: Continue
Description: Choose the music that plays on the Continue screen. (Default: Sonic 3)

Elements.Name: AllClear
Description: Choose the All Clear music that plays at the end of Launch Base Zone. (Default: Sonic & Knuckles)

Elements.Name: Ending
Description: Choose the music that plays in the ending cutscenes. (Default: Sonic 3 Credits)

Elements.Name: Credits
Description: Choose the credits music. (Default: Sonic & Knuckles)

Elements.Name: Results
Description: Choose the music that plays in the Competition Mode results screen and the Blue Sphere menus. (Default: Sonic & Knuckles)

Elements.Name: NBSPerfect
Description: Choose the music that plays on the New Blue Sphere Perfect screen. (Default: Unused Song)
Use the track from Sonic the Hedgehog 3.
Use the track from Sonic & Knuckles.
Use the track from Sonic the Hedgehog 3.
Use the track from Sonic & Knuckles.
Use the Medallion sound effect from Sonic Mania.
Use the Invincibility music from Sonic the Hedgehog 3.
Use the Invincibility music from Sonic & Knuckles.
Use the Unused Song from the Sonic 3 Prototype.
Use the New Super Sonic music from Sonic Origins.
Use the Sky Sanctuary Zone music, a la the Genesis version of Sonic (3) & Knuckles.
Use the Credits music from Sonic the Hedgehog 3.
Use the Credits music from Sonic & Knuckles.
